item.title: PowerSploit
item.description: PowerSploit is an offensive security framework for penetration testers and reverse engineers. It was born out of the realization that PowerShell was the ideal post-exploitation utility in Windows due to its ability to perform a wide range of administrative and low-level tasks all without the need to drop malicious executables to disk, thus, evading antivirus products with ease.
